bug.title: cursor jumps before housenumber when adding letter

parg.st: 2. task the housenumber is for example "10a", so type 10 and the letter button
3. the cursor jumps before the number, so when you insert "a" you have "a10" instead of "10a" expected behavior
cursor should stay at the end of the input field, so new input get's added to the end
i used a quiet old version before i updated, there it was also like this.
